reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major refractive error types: myopia (~22,000 per 100k), hyperopia (~8,000 per 100k), astigmatism (~5,000 per 100k), mixed errors (~2,500 per 100k). Total ~35,000 per 100k. Very broad aggregate with heterogeneous subcategories.
source: Ophthalmology epidemiological estimates, refractive error prevalence studies
